titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5715) to ensure continued availability of access to the Federal student loan program for students and families.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-590, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The amendment printed in Part A of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 206.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1107.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the end of debate on H. Res. 1107, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question, and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr Lincoln Diaz-Balart (FL) demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 198 (Roll no. 194).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 192 (Roll no. 195).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/16/2008--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 5715 (Ensuring Continued Access to Student Loans Act of 2008).
